reviewText:
I like this Carman's video because It relates well with the crazy world we live in.
It will reach young people, and puts a song and thoughts of Salvation and hope in your heart and mind.
His music is addicting in a healing way. I thank God for his ministry. He has a passion to reach people for Christ.
share this video with everyone.
This video met our churches and my expectations and more.  I used it for our Hallelujah night and all the children said the sinner's prayer and we were so blessed.  Thank you Carman.
I use to have this video & always loved it, actually wore it out. Ordered this one a few weeks ago & love it too but it has a bad skip in the last part. Bummer, but still watching it.
It was everything I wanted and more. I grew up listening and watching Carmen, I remember these videos from when I was a child and I'm very excited to have them back in my life!
I bought this for my brother and he loved it!  The picture quality was still like new....as described....so was the sleeve!
